title: The Future of Web Development
summary: Explore how modern frameworks and AI are shaping the future of websites.
content: Web development is evolving rapidly with AI tools, faster frameworks, and better design systems. Developers today focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience more than ever.

title: Why Every Student Should Learn Coding
summary: Coding builds logic, creativity, and problem-solving skills.
content: Learning to code is no longer optional. It empowers students to build apps, automate tasks, and understand the technology-driven world around them.

title: Design Principles for Modern Websites
summary: Minimalism, spacing, and typography make sites look premium.
content: Professional websites use clean layouts, consistent colors, and readable fonts. The key is simplicity combined with smart user experience decisions.

title: How to Stay Motivated While Learning Tech
summary: Consistency beats motivation when building skills.
content: Instead of waiting for motivation, create a daily habit of learning. Small progress every day leads to big results in the long run.

title: Building Your First Portfolio Website
summary: A portfolio helps showcase your work professionally.
content: A strong portfolio includes projects, skills, and contact details. It tells your story and helps recruiters or clients understand your capabilities.
